code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='https://api.the-odds-api.com/v4/sports/basketball_nba/odds/';const API_KEY='b52a9454e4debad17c2d97210ef9e90c';export const fetchOdds=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(API_URL,{params:{regions:'au',markets:'h2h',apiKey:API_KEY}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching odds:',error);throw error;}};
